message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential benefits to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price, considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $10,500. This offer reflects a compromise that I believe benefits us both.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
